resources.string: Tap on the top image to play startup and death sound
Tap on the top image to play startup sound
This machine does not have startup or death sound
Long press the top image to view the large image
Tap below to access more specifications
The current volume is too high. Do you want to proceed playing?\nSelect \"Confirm\" to turn this warning off temporarily.\nGo to preferences page to turn this function off.
Open the drawer to navigate inside the application. Open the menu to access more options and get help.
Press the back button again to exit MacIndex

Open Directly in EveryMac is enabled. MacIndex will open the EveryMac Page of the machine directly instead of the Specifications Page. If you want to disable this function, please access the Preferences Page.
Sort by time again to ensure correct positions for machines not in the same category. Turn off can make the loading faster. This affects the Main Page and Search Page.
Sort by time or sort by the order of addition. Turn off can make the loading faster. This affects the Favourites Page and Custom Comments Page.
Open the EveryMac Page of the machine directly instead of the Specifications Page. Will ask for specific configuration if the machine has more than one configurations.
This is effective for both Main Page and Search Page. Some functions will no longer be available as well.
Play startup and death sound alternatively in the Specifications Page, or play the startup sound only.
Enable high volume warning when using headphones in the Specifications Page.
Enable buttons to navigate between machines in the Specifications Page.
Always override the navigation range to the belonged category.
Only pick random machines inside the current group instead of all categories.
Save Usage in the Main Page
Save the last selected filter and viewing method.
Save Usage in the Search Page
Save the last used filter and search options.
Save Usage in the Comparison Page
Save the last selected machines and column.

Your saved preference file will be completely cleared, including your preferences and all usage records. After you confirm, MacIndex will quit. This is helpful for troubleshooting, but cannot be undone.
Your input contains illegal character(s) for the current searching option. Please double check your input, then try again.
Your input exceed the maximum allowed length for the current searching option. Please double check your input, then try again.
This can evaluate the performance of the current version MacIndex.
Benchmark has completed. This reflects the performance of the current version of MacIndex. Lower is better.
Benchmark has completed. Based on the score, enabling enhanced sorting is not recommended. Turning it off will improve your experience. You can enable it later at the preferences page.

Benchmark has completed. Based on the score, enabling enhanced sorting is recommended. Turning it on can ensure the correct order and will not impact your experience. You can disable it later at the preferences page.
Benchmark was interrupted. Please do not use your phone or leave MacIndex during the process.
Not Available (Could be edited in the menu)
The special character \'│\' is internally used by MacIndex and cannot be included in the comment
Your input is too long, the max limit for each machine is 500 characters
Access all existing comments in the Custom Comments Page.
More than one configurations were found for this machine. Please make a selection then confirm.
Due to sale region or special purpose, this machine is not available in EveryMac
Sorry, but this page is only available in Chinese. Proceed to the page?
Please report the bug to the developer. It is recommended to restart the application.
Benchmark in progress, please wait. Do not use your phone or leave MacIndex.
No comment has been saved yet. You can add a custom comment at any Specifications Page.
No comment has been saved yet
Please select the custom comment(s) to delete. This cannot be undone.
All existing custom comments will be cleared. This cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?
No folder has been created yet. You can create a new folder right now, or you can create it later at the Favourites Page.
No folder has been created yet
Please select the folder(s). Manage your favourites folders in the Favourites Page.
Please select the folder(s) to delete. This cannot be undone.
Please select the folder to rename.
The special character \'│\' is internally used by MacIndex and cannot be included in the folder name
Your input is too long, the max limit for each folder is 1 line and 30 characters
This name was already specified and cannot be reused
You can only create no more than 10 folders.
All folders will be deleted. This cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?
You need at least 2 machines in the comparison list to use the comparison functions. You can add a machine at any Specifications Page.
You need at least 2 machines in the comparison list
The comparison list will be cleared. This cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?
No machine has been added in the comparison list yet. You can add a machine at any Specifications Page.
Please select the machine(s) to delete from the comparison list. This cannot be undone.

Randomly entered one of your favourite machine.
